extendedInfo.description: Accept credit cards wherever business takes you with Spark Pay from Capital One BankÂ®.Take Visa, MasterCard, Discover and American Express payments using your free Spark Pay card reader and Android device. In addition, Spark Pay is loaded with features to help grow your business.CLEAR AND COMPETITIVE PRICINGChoose the plan that works best for your business:Â·  Go Plan: 2.70% per swipe with no monthly feeÂ·  Pro Plan: 1.95% per swipe with a $9.95 monthly feeFor more information on our pricing plans, please visit sparkpay.com.SET UP IN MINUTES1.  Download the FREE Spark Pay app2.  Enroll in the app or at sparkpay.com3.  Start accepting credit card paymentsFAST FUNDINGYour sales will be automatically deposited into your bank account within two business days.SAFE & SECURESpark Pay fully encrypts all information during transactions, so you can be confident your customersâ data is safe. Spark Pay is one of the first mobile payment solutions offered by a top-10 US Bank, with hardware provided by VeriFone, a global leader in secure payment technologies. OH, BUT THEREâS MORE:Â·  Easy-to-use online dashboard to manage transactions, multiple users, and view sales reports and analyticsÂ·  Live customer supportÂ·  Item management and updated inventory levels with Stich Labs integrationÂ·  Create custom Spark Pay deals that can be distributed to customers via email, Facebook, and TwitterÂ·  Customizable e-receipts that link to your businessâ social media sitesLearn more at SparkPay.com

reviews.title: My favorite merchant  app
reviews.comment: Card reader works better than Square, UI is not as simple as Square, can\'t send receipt as a text (dumb)2.7% rate or 1.95% for $9.95 a month, quick deposits. They do require more info for initial set-up. For the savings, and the better card reader = better than Square!
reviews.author: Nick Roehl

reviews.title: Perfect device
reviews.comment: This device is better then square at every aspect. Great device.
reviews.author: Michael Pantoja

reviews.title: Cheating on fees;
reviews.comment: For a monthly plan (probably the same for no-monthly plan), when they calculate the fee, they apply 1.95% to each sales transaction amount and round up the fee to bring up the fee, e.g. 5.01 cents => 6 cents. On the average if you have two hundred transactions, this adds up to $1.00 daily. This is absolutely against the basic accounting practice and is cheating merchants.  Why not round off or apply the rate once to the total of daily transactions? \302\240I complained about it, so far no change. I think they are doing this intentionally, not by mistake. Please be honest.
reviews.author: Hank K

reviews.title: This app sucks-doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: I have been trying to download this app on 3 different devices.and it will not let me setup!  Don\'t waste your time with this headache! !!
reviews.author: Ronica Gomez

reviews.title: Account Closed
reviews.comment: I signed up to get this service for my small business and they later called me telling me my account will be closed. Well, I guess I\'ll be working with someone else who will appreciate my business.
reviews.author: Marco Martinez

reviews.title: It\'s a joke.
reviews.comment: Should be named can\'t pay. I signed up, was accepted, received my card reader, canceled Wells Fargo merchant services and I was good to go. So I thought. My first card I could not scan as it reported not connected to a data service. Checked my Internet connection and I was connected. Back at the office I keyed in card info and received a message I exceeded my limit. It was a 4000.00 transaction. Called Sparkpay and was told \"oh we don\'t start the approval process until you try to process a card\".....
reviews.author: Kenneth Miyake

reviews.title: A lot of potential, but not there yet.
reviews.comment: Spark Pay is a good system and has the lowest credit card processing fee rate that we have found around. It has very nice features on customizing the receipt, it is very quick and easy to use once you get the hang of it. The major problems as it relates to us are: 1- limited Multi User functionality. Currently there is only one level of access.  We need to have multiple users be able to use the system, which it does allow now. However we want to be able to limit the other users to see their own transactions only. We don\'t want someone possibly void someone else\'s transaction.  So we really like to see a \'manager\' level userid which can see and manage all of the transactions and users, and then we like to see a \'user\' level userid which can only charge the cards, see their own transactions and possibly Void their own transactions. We don\'t want users to be able to Refund credit cards. 2- We want the \'manager\' userid to get all of the emails when users use the app and charge credit cards. currently only the users can get emails on their own transactions. This is useless to us.  If it wasn\'t for these two major issues , we would give this app 4.5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Account Was CANCELLED!!!! For NO REASON!!!!
reviews.comment: DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE. BETTER COMPANIES ON HERE.
reviews.author: Willie Torres

reviews.title: Crash
reviews.comment: app crashes when I plug in my card reader  as useless as it was on sailpay my square card reader is just fine  I\'ll just stick with that not compatible with tablet either  useless  app   htcevo4g
reviews.author: Rich Girard

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works on both my Droid and iphone 5.  Love being able to always say \"I take credit card\". Love the accounting/tracking features
reviews.author: Jason Rentz

reviews.title: Account Closed
reviews.comment: Closed my account before I started using swiper in place of other services. Approval should be made up front not 1 month after swiper arrives. Based on background over 15 years ago. Use Square, PayPal, or others instead!!
reviews.author: Kevin Coleman
